plot: Jonah, a promising track athlete abandons his hopes and dreams after a tragic accident leaves him paralyzed from the waist down. Unable to cope, Jonah turns to drugs and lives in isolation....
title: The Most Beautiful Thing
plot_es: Jonah, a promising track athlete abandons his hopes and dreams after a tragic accident leaves him paralyzed from the waist down. Unable to cope, Jonah turns to drugs and lives in isolation....
plot_en: Jonah, a promising track athlete abandons his hopes and dreams after a tragic accident leaves him paralyzed from the waist down. Unable to cope, Jonah turns to drugs and lives in isolation....
